Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a light-brown pottery vessel, the interior is encrusted with a brown a granular deposit, the exterior is covered with a buff-coloured slip and very faint traces of a Coptic text written in black ink.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394823) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394823)
